attributes.additional_details: The undersigned petition HM Government to take action and bring Joseph Kony (Leader of the LRA and the worlds most wanted war criminal) to justice. We want the children in those regions to be safe to grow up in peace and security. We want the government to work in collaboration with other governments to swiftly and effectively capture Joseph Kony, and make him accountable for the horrendous war crimes for which he is responsible. We want this to happen in 2012.
